results.content: Fantastic course, very good instructor and the content covered is relevant to pretty much build the majority of APIs needed nowadays. This is coming from an Vue.js and Typescript developer that wanted to have the ability to get a solid backend up and running with proper authentication etc. I now have my eyes on the advanced version of this course actually just to wrap everything up with a nice bow on top!

results.content:
This course is well done. The explications are clear. My two pieces of advice for better use of the course: 
The author guides you to realize a like Trello app, but if you don't know the real Trello the explication of endpoints to realize may be difficult, so have a look at the real app or to a tutorial on Youtube.
If you are on a MAC you may overcome the lack of zooming using the zoom of Accessibility on MAC.
results.content_html:
